function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Statistical differences in annoyance ratings for different noise sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difference in neighbor noise perception based on time spent in different areas of the house","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased percentage of respondents hearing neighbour noise during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Statistically significant increase in mean annoyance ratings for certain noise sources during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of neighbour noise annoyance ratings across dwelling types","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased noise complaints across various noise sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant increase in indoor noise levels during the lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sleep disturbance due to neighbor noise during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in outdoor noise complaints during lockdown, particularly due to birds and construction/building works","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in outdoor noise complaints for transport and voice/instrument sources during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased number of noise complaints during the lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Statistically significant increase in tweets with noise complaints during the lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparing noise levels before and during lockdown may indicate changes in behavior and activity, impacting disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Annoyance caused by noise pollution may lead to stress and weakened immune systems, increasing susceptibility to contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of annoyance ratings to percentage of highly annoyed may oversimplify the impact of noise on mental and physical health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact and airborne particles due to close proximity in densely populated living spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared communal spaces and contact with commonly touched surfaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through manual extraction of tweets","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of misclassification or misinterpretation of noise-related tweets","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to potentially harmful content during manual tweet extraction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data collection from twitter may include biased samples and may not represent the entire population’s attitudes towards noise","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of attitudes towards noise before and during the lockdown may not account for external factors that influence noise perception","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection and analysis rely on social media, which may not capture the attitudes of individuals who do not use social media platforms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased noise levels during lockdown may lead to an increase in human interaction and activity, contributing to the potential spread of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 due to reduced traffic flow and movement restrictions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased traffic flow leading to improved air quality and reduced noise
